description:
Pokémon: Best Wishes! is the fourth animated Pokémon series, based on the video games Pokémon Black and White. http://anidb.net/ch16390 [Takeshi] and http://anidb.net/ch11588 [Hikari] have left the series, and http://anidb.net/ch6693 [Satoshi] travels to the new region of Isshu and is joined by a new female trainer named http://anidb.net/ch21697 [Iris] and a new male trainer named http://anidb.net/ch21700 [Dent].
Source: Wikipedia

REGULAR.description: The gang come across a kindergarten being bothered by the Garbage Pokémon Yabukuron.
